title: Rule 20: Terms and Conditions of Officers and Employees of the Board
description: Rule 20 focuses on the framework for managing the officers and employees who assist the Data Protection Board of India in carrying out its functions. While the Chairperson and Members provide leadership and take decisions, the officers and staff form the operational backbone of the Board, handling investigations, documentation, communication, and technical management of its digital systems.
